name: etsy_bulk_search
description: Search multiple products on Etsy in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling etsy_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string. Example: 'handmade jewelry,custom mugs,vintage clothing'.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'handmade ring,custom necklace,vintage brooch')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.v2-listing-card, li[data-listing-id]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 5); i++) { const el = cards[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h2.v2-listing-card__title, h3.v2-listing-card__title, h2, h3, a[title]'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('span.currency-value, [data-currency-value]'); const currencyEl = el.querySelector('span.currency-symbol'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a.listing-link, a[href*="/listing/"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); const shopEl = el.querySelector('p a[href*="/shop/"], [aria-label*="shop"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[aria-label*="star"], [aria-label*="rating"]'); const freeShippingEl = el.querySelector('[aria-label*="shipping"], [data-free-shipping]'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? (titleEl.getAttribute('title') || titleEl.textContent.trim()) : '', price: (currencyEl ? currencyEl.textContent.trim() : '') + (priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : ''), url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', shop_name: shopEl ? shopEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? (ratingEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || ratingEl.textContent.trim()) : '', free_shipping: !!freeShippingEl }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
